item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: June 10, 2023 Today's Verse Romans 8:18 [18] For I consider that the sufferings of this present time are not worth comparing with the glory that is to be revealed to us. Today's Memory Verse James 1:22 - But be doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves. John 14:6 - Jesus said to him, â€œI am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
